scribe_loc_naval_man-o'-war.name: Naval Man-o'-War
scribe_loc_naval_man-o'-war.description: A formidable ship with sails emblazoned with the stern crest of Captain 'Iron Will' Thorne.

scribe_loc_tortuga's_pride.name: Tortuga's Pride
scribe_loc_tortuga's_pride.description: The nearest port, a haven for all manner of rogues and revelers.

scribe_loc_the_serpent's_kiss.name: The Serpent's Kiss
scribe_loc_the_serpent's_kiss.description: Captain 'Ironhide' Kael's notorious vessel, a viper in the waves, always on the prowl

scribe_npc_captain_'iron_will'_thorne.name: Captain 'Iron Will' Thorne
scribe_npc_captain_'iron_will'_thorne.description: He's notoriously prejudiced, seeing any deviation from his rigid norms as a personal affront. He's here to stamp out what he considers 'immorality.'

scribe_npc_jax.name: Jax
scribe_npc_jax.description: A lean, tattooed shipmate, whose eyes, the color of a stormy sea, hold a mix of challenge and undeniable admiration.

scribe_npc_silus.name: Silus
scribe_npc_silus.description: The fiery quartermaster, a master of blades and biting wit with a reputation for daring escapades and even more daring affections.

story_state.narrative_direction: The player is excited about sailing to Tortuga's Pride. Lean into the classic pirate voyage tropes: the salt spray, the creaking timbers, the distant horizon. Describe the bustling port as they prepare, or the open sea if they've already cast off. This is a journey with a clear destination driven by player enthusiasm. Focus on the thrill of the open sea and the allure of their chosen destination.
story_state.active_threat: A notoriously swift and ruthless Pirate Hunter vessel, 'The Serpent's Kiss,' commanded by the relentless Captain 'Ironhide' Kael, has recently been sighted in these waters, known for capturing pirate crews and turning them over to the Crown for hefty bounties. They might appear on the horizon, or their reputation could precede them at Tortuga's Pride.

shadow_queue.name: The Weave's Shimmering Threshold
shadow_queue.description: A pulsating tear in the fabric of the Void, radiating a gentle, inviting warmth and a soft, melodic hum. It seems to beckon, hinting at other realities or hidden truths.

shadow_queue.name: Heartstone of the Unravelled
shadow_queue.description: Nestled at the heart of the distortion, a large, multifaceted gem pulses with an inner light, emitting the rhythmic hum and the unusual warmth. It feels like a fragment of creation itself, fallen into the Void.

shadow_queue.name: The Dream-Seer's Silhouette
shadow_queue.description: Within the shimmering distortion, a faint, humanoid silhouette flickers into brief focus. Its form is indistinct, but its presence feels incredibly ancient and perceptive, observing your every move from the veil.

shadow_queue.name: The Dream-Seer's Silhouette
shadow_queue.description: A colossal figure of shifting shadows and faint starlight materializes before you. Its eyes, burning with an ancient, knowing light, pierce through the void, fixing upon your very soul. It floats in unnerving silence, an enigma of intent, its presence demanding decipherment.

shadow_queue.name: The Pulsating Heartstone
shadow_queue.description: Just beyond the Dream-Seer's form, suspended in the void, a gemstone of impossible depths throbs with a soft, crimson light. It hums with a silent song, radiating a strange, almost magnetic warmth that hints at a power beyond comprehension—the very mystery the Dream-Seer's gaze seems to guard or reveal.

shadow_queue.name: Whispers of Fragmented Truths
shadow_queue.description: Around you, the Void shimmers with ethereal motes of light, coalescing into fleeting images and murmurs. These are the spectral echoes of forgotten truths, fragmented memories of worlds and beings long vanished. They drift tantalizingly close, offering glimpses of context or revelation if one can grasp their ephemeral essence.
